TopicTitle: A favorites tab for parts, perhaps

Articles.Content: I go to select some parts ten times for every build, and other parts only one time every ten builds, so why should the latter group make it harder for me to access the parts I'm selecting? It would be nice to be able to select a handful of parts and put them in some kind of favorites or speed dial tab, so there's a lot less flipping pages and switching between tabs to find what's needed. If the favorites tab was limited to one page, that would be an ample 24 parts that would always be findable and placeable immediately from their user-chosen positions in the list.
I really like this idea. It's simple, but effective for finding parts. However, if they ever add a part search system this might become obsolete.
Seems good, how about a "Most Used" tab where it counts how many of each part there is in each of your ships, then compiles a list of parts depending on total part count.
How about a dedicated tab in the interface for parts already used on the current ship? That way it customizes itself to the current task as you go.

How about a dedicated tab in the interface for parts already used on the current ship? That way it customizes itself to the current task as you go.

If they somehow included a customizable favorites tab and this idea that would be amazing. I love them both.

I found a mod that partially addresses this issue:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34779-0-21-Simple-Part-Organizer-%28v0-250%29

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-20-simple-part-organizer-v0-100-2/

I haven't seen a favorite part tab yet, but they have made it really easy to find parts from specific mods (such as exclude all but B9 Aerospace).
Agreed! This would be a huge time saver.
